original_text:
Fruits in Flames
Prodotta dalla statunitense Bally, Fruits in Flames è una slot dal gameplay semplice che ha tutti gli ingredienti giusti per regalarvi vincite strepitose!
Tema e grafica
Riprendendo il titolo di un famoso romanzo di inizio Novecento, ci verrebbe da esclamare “Niente di nuovo sul fronte occidentale”. Fruits in Flames infatti è solo una delle tante slot a tema frutta che affollano il panorama dei giochi online. La domanda lecita che ci potremmo fare è perché scegliere di provarla. Be’, i motivi sono diversi, a partire dall’estrema semplicità del gameplay: qui non troverete nessuna funzione speciale che si attiva al raggiungimento di determinati traguardi, né simboli speciali, nessun Wild e nemmeno Scatter. Per certi versi possiamo dire che Fruits in Flames è un inno alla traduzione più pura delle slot machine. Un secondo motivo per cui sceglierla è di sicuro la grafica curata, ma se conoscete altri prodotti di casa Bally risulterà superfluo persino scriverlo. Il colore nero che caratterizza la griglia di gioco fa risaltare il colore brillante dei simboli, un contrasto reso ancora più evidente dalle fiamme sullo sfondo. Ai lati della cornice troviamo le linee di vincita e nella parte sottostante le informazioni che riassumono la nostra scommessa. Ci sono poi i tasti per effettuare la scommessa massima in un colpo solo, per l’Autoplay e quello Start.
Caratteristiche della slot
Si gioca su 10 linee di pagamento fisse disposte su una griglia dal taglio tradizionale con 5 rulli e 3 righe. La scommessa base è di 10 monete che può essere alzata sino a un massimo di 10.000, anche attraverso il tasto Max Bet. Si vince quando simboli uguali appaiono in un successione da sinistra a destra su una linea di pagamento, in caso di più combinazioni su diverse linee le vincite vengono sommate. Non è possibile attivare un numero predefinito di giri automatici ed è possibile fermarli in ogni momento cliccando sul tasto Stop.
Fruits in Flames ha un RTP pari al 96,17%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Uno dei grandi pregi di Fruits in Flames è l’offerta di vincite di livello. Negli esempi che seguiranno terremo conto della puntata minima di 10 € per illustrare gli importi che potrebbero essere vinti. I simboli delle ciliegie, del limone, dell’arancio e della prugna sono quelli che valgono meno, se compaiono per 3 volte si vincono 20 €, con 5 ben 200 €! A seguire troviamo l’anguria e le campanelle e anche in questo caso le cifre non sono banali. £ simboli ci faranno guadagnare 50 €, con 5 si ha diritto a una vincita di 500 €! Il 7 è il simbolo con il più alto valore in assoluto: 3 ci regalano 100 €, 5 l’invidiabile cifra di 5.000 €!
Su Fruits in Flames è intro presente la funzione Gamble, per provare a raddoppiare la vincita. A seguito di una combinazione pagante, sullo schermo apparirò tre pulsanti: Collect, Card Gamble e Ladder Gamble. Nel primo caso incasseremo la vincita e continueremo il gioco normale. Se scegliamo Card Gamble ci troveremo di fronte a un mazzo di carte e noi dovremo scegliere di quale colore sarà la carta successiva. Nel caso di Ladder Gamble invece ci troveremo di fronte a una serie di importi di entità crescente disposti in verticale. Il nostro compito sarà quello di riuscire a selezionare la cifra superiore al punto di partenza evitando di cliccare su quella inferiore.

raw_translation.response:
Fruits in Flames
Produced by the American Bally, Fruits in Flames is a simple slot game that has all the right ingredients to give you amazing wins!
Theme and Graphics
Taking its title from a famous novel of the early 20th century, one could exclaim "Nothing new on the Western front". Fruits in Flames is just one of the many fruit-themed slots that crowd the online gaming scene. The legitimate question we could ask ourselves is why choose to try it out. Well, the reasons are diverse, starting with the extreme simplicity of the gameplay: here you won't find any special features that activate upon reaching certain milestones, nor special symbols, no Wilds, and no Scatters. In some ways, we can say that Fruits in Flames is a hymn to the purest translation of slot machines. A second reason to choose it is certainly the careful graphics, but if you know other Bally products, it will be even more superfluous to write it. The black color that characterizes the game grid highlights the bright color of the symbols, a contrast made even more evident by the flames in the background. On the sides of the frame we find the pay lines and in the lower part the information that summarizes our bet. There are then the buttons to make the maximum bet all at once, for Autoplay and Start.
Slot Characteristics
You play on 10 fixed pay lines arranged on a traditionally cut grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. The base bet is 10 coins that can be raised up to a maximum of 10,000, also through the Max Bet button. You win when the same symbols appear in a sequence from left to right on a pay line, in case of more combinations on different lines, the winnings are added. It is not possible to activate a predefined number of automatic spins and it is possible to stop them at any time by clicking on the Stop button.
Fruits in Flames has an RTP of 96.17%.
Symbols and Functionality
One of the great advantages of Fruits in Flames is the offer of high-level winnings. In the examples that follow, we will take into account the minimum bet of €10 to illustrate the amounts that could be won. The symbols of cherries, lemon, orange, and plum are the least valuable, if they appear for 3 times, you win €20, and with 5 a whopping €200! Next, we find the watermelon and the bells, and even in this case, the figures are not trivial. £ symbols will earn us €50, with 5 we are entitled to a win of €500! The 7 is the symbol with the highest value of all: 3 will give us €100, 5 the enviable figure of €5,000!
Fruits in Flames introduces the Gamble feature to try to double the winnings. Following a winning combination, three buttons will appear on the screen: Collect, Card Gamble, and Ladder Gamble. In the first case, we will collect the winnings and continue the normal game. If we choose Card Gamble, we will be faced with a deck of cards, and we have to choose what color the next card will be. In the case of Ladder Gamble instead, we will be faced with a series of increasing amounts arranged vertically. Our task will be to try to select the highest figure above the starting point, avoiding clicking on the lower one.

In the case of Ladder Gamble, you will be presented with a series of amounts of increasing amounts arranged vertically. Your task will be to select the higher figure, evading clicking on the lower one.

Experience the Thrill of Traditional Slot Machines with Fruits in Flames

", "content": "

Fruits in Flames is the perfect game for those who love traditional slot machines. This game is a throwback to the classic slot machines of the past, without all the bells and whistles of modern slot machines. You won't find any special symbols or features in this game, which is perfect for players who want to get back to basics.

Despite the lack of special symbols or features, Fruits in Flames still manages to impress with its stunning graphics and attention to detail. The fruits are bright and juicy, and the flames bring a fiery excitement to the game. The layout of the game is clear and easy to navigate, making it suitable for both seasoned players and those new to slot machines.

But just because Fruits in Flames is a traditional game doesn't mean it lacks excitement. The Gamble feature is a fun addition to the game that gives players the opportunity to double their winnings. While it may not be as flashy or exciting as the special features found in other slot games, it's the perfect addition to a game that's all about the nostalgia.

In conclusion, if you're someone who prefers the simpler times of classic slot machines, then Fruits in Flames is the slot game for you. With its traditional gameplay and stunning graphics, it's a game that will bring back memories of simpler times. So why not give it a spin and see if you can hit the jackpot?

" }

Review:
 
Gameplay

Fruits in Flames is a slot game with a traditional 5x3 grid and 10 fixed pay lines. There are no special features or symbols, making it a simple and straightforward game to play. The minimum bet is 10 coins and can be raised up to a maximum of 10,000 coins. Automatic spins cannot be pre-set, but players can stop them at any time by clicking on Stop.

Visuals

Fruits in Flames has simple and colorful graphics with a black game grid that highlights the bright symbol colors. The flames in the background add to the theme of the game, and the pay lines are displayed on the sides of the frame. Information on the bet is shown at the bottom, along with buttons for making the maximum bet, Autoplay, and Start.

Symbols

The symbols in Fruits in Flames are fruits (cherries, lemon, orange, and plum), watermelon, bells, and the 7. The 7 is the highest paying symbol with the potential to win €5,000 when appearing 5 times on a pay line. The minimum bet of €10 can earn players €20 for 3 fruit symbols, and up to €200 for 5 of the same kind. The £ symbol pays €50, and 5 of them can win you €500.

Payouts

Fruits in Flames has an RTP of 96.17% and offers high-level winnings. The amounts that can be won depend on the type and number of symbols that appear on a pay line. Wins are awarded when the same symbols appear in a sequence from left to right. If more combinations appear on different lines, the winnings are added.

Gamble Feature

Fruits in Flames introduces the Gamble feature that appears after a winning combination. Players can choose to collect their winnings or try to double them by selecting Card Gamble or Ladder Gamble. In Card Gamble, players must guess the color of the next card, while in Ladder Gamble, players must select the highest figure above the starting point, avoiding clicking on the lower one.

Review:
 
Gameplay

Fruits in Flames is a simple and classic slot game that focuses on traditional slot machine gameplay. There are no special features or symbols, including Wilds and Scatters. Players play on 10 fixed pay lines on a grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. The base bet is ten coins, which can be raised to a maximum of 10,000 with the Max Bet button. Winning combinations occur when the same symbols appear in sequence from left to right on a pay line. It is possible to stop the game at any time by clicking on the Stop button.

Graphics

The graphics of Fruits in Flames are done with great attention to detail. The game grid is black, which contrasts well with the brightly-colored symbols. The background features flames that add a sense of excitement to the game. The pay lines are displayed on the sides of the frame, and the bet information is presented in the lower part of the screen. The buttons to make the maximum bet all at once, for Autoplay, and Start are easy to find and use.

Winning Potential

Fruits in Flames offers high-level winnings compared to other fruit-themed slot games. The RTP of the game is 96.17%. The least valuable symbols are the cherries, lemon, orange, and plum, which pay €20 for three symbols and €200 for five symbols. The watermelon and bells symbols pay higher, and the £ symbols will earn the player €50, whereas five £ symbols will earn €500. The most valuable symbol is the 7, which pays €100 for three symbols and €5,000 for five symbols.

Gamble Feature

Fruits in Flames introduces the Gamble feature to double winning combinations. After a winning combination, players may choose to Collect the winnings or play the Gamble feature. The feature includes two options: Card Gamble and Ladder Gamble. In the Card Gamble, players will be presented with a deck of cards and must choose the color of the next card. In Ladder Gamble, players will be presented with a series of increasing amounts arranged vertically, and they must try to select the highest figure above the starting point, avoiding clicking on the lower amount.

Traditional Slot Machine Style

Fruits in Flames is a slot game that focuses on traditional slot machine gameplay and style. The lack of special symbols and features adds to the traditional elements of the game that fans of classic slot machines will appreciate. The graphics and layout of the game have been created with great attention to detail, making the game visually appealing to players. The Gamble feature adds an extra level of excitement to the game and gives players the chance to double their winnings.

Review: Fruits in Flames
Produced by the American Bally, Fruits in Flames is a simple slot game that has all the right ingredients to give you amazing wins!
Theme and Graphics
Taking its title from a famous novel of the early 20th century, one could exclaim "Nothing new on the Western front". Fruits in Flames is just one of the many fruit-themed slots that crowd the online gaming scene. The legitimate question we could ask ourselves is why choose to try it out. Well, the reasons are diverse, starting with the extreme simplicity of the gameplay: here you won't find any special features that activate upon reaching certain milestones, nor special symbols, no Wilds, and no Scatters. In some ways, we can say that Fruits in Flames is a hymn to the purest translation of slot machines. A second reason to choose it is certainly the careful graphics, but if you know other Bally products, it will be even more superfluous to write it. The black color that characterizes the game grid highlights the bright color of the symbols, a contrast made even more evident by the flames in the background. On the sides of the frame we find the pay lines and in the lower part the information that summarizes our bet. There are then the buttons to make the maximum bet all at once, for Autoplay and Start.
Slot Characteristics
You play on 10 fixed pay lines arranged on a traditionally cut grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. The base bet is 10 coins that can be raised up to a maximum of 10,000, also through the Max Bet button. You win when the same symbols appear in a sequence from left to right on a pay line, in case of more combinations on different lines, the winnings are added. It is not possible to activate a predefined number of automatic spins and it is possible to stop them at any time by clicking on the Stop button.
Fruits in Flames has an RTP of 96.17%.
Symbols and Functionality
One of the great advantages of Fruits in Flames is the offer of high-level winnings. In the examples that follow, we will take into account the minimum bet of €10 to illustrate the amounts that could be won. The symbols of cherries, lemon, orange, and plum are the least valuable, if they appear for 3 times, you win €20, and with 5 a whopping €200! Next, we find the watermelon and the bells, and even in this case, the figures are not trivial. £ symbols will earn us €50, with 5 we are entitled to a win of €500! The 7 is the symbol with the highest value of all: 3 will give us €100, 5 the enviable figure of €5,000!
Fruits in Flames introduces the Gamble feature to try to double the winnings. Following a winning combination, three buttons will appear on the screen: Collect, Card Gamble, and Ladder Gamble. In the first case, we will collect the winnings and continue the normal game. If we choose Card Gamble, we will be faced with a deck of cards, and we have to choose what color the next card will be. In the case of Ladder Gamble instead, we will be faced with a series of increasing amounts arranged vertically. Our task will be to try to select the highest figure above the starting point, avoiding clicking on the lower one.
